name: Madden NFL 2003
description:
The Madden franchise returns for another year on the PlayStation with Madden NFL 2003. Changes compared to the previous year's outing are minimal. The game uses the same menus and all the previous game modes and features are reused. The major changes are updated teams and rosters and new music tracks.

The included teams have been updated for the 2002 NFL season (reorganized into the new divisions) and include the 32 regular teams, NFC and AFC all-star teams, two All-Madden teams (2000 and Super Bowl), more than 90 classic NFL teams, 31 all-time franchise teams and the 6 NFL Europe teams.

The returning modes include Exhibition, Season, Franchise, Custom League, Tournament, Coaches Corner, Situation (including Great Games), and Two-Minute Drill. The Madden Classic mode that puts the current teams into Madden 92 also returns, as does the card-collecting sub-game Madden Cards.
